events.message: I just got into a car accident this morning. The collision caused significant damage to my vehicle and I need to file a claim immediately.
The claim has been reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident due to the nature of the reported collision and vehicle damage.
An insurance agent has been assigned to your case to assist you through the process and coordinate the next steps.
We have received your claim and acknowledge the incident details you provided regarding the auto accident.
Please submit the police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and your driver's license to continue processing your claim.
All requested documents including the police report and car photos have been submitted successfully for your claim file.
Our claims investigation team has begun reviewing the submitted evidence and details concerning the car accident.
The investigation into the vehicle collision is complete and all relevant facts have been gathered for assessment.
Based on the investigation, a settlement offer has been proposed to cover your vehicle damages and related expenses.
The customer provided feedback on the settlement proposal, requesting clarification on some of the coverage details.
Your claim has been approved following the satisfactory resolution of all questions and confirmation of coverage.
The settlement payment has been issued and should be reflected in your account within 3-5 business days.
This claim has now been closed as all necessary payments have been processed and no further action is required.
The claim documents and case files have been archived for future reference and compliance with regulatory standards.
